EmailTemplate.subject: TriTech's 2013 Perform Training Institute - Thank you for your registration!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> 2013 Perform Training Institute Thank you for your registration
An official quote from TriTech will be sent and your registration will be completed once it is returned to us with the proper signatures. Thank you!
We look forward to an educational and enjoyable training. Please contact your respective Client Account Manager for questions.
David Bell
(774) 239-3722
david.bell@tritech.com <mailto:david.bell@tritech.com>
Mark Baranowski
(978) 215-2270
mark.baranowski@tritech.com <mailto:mark.baranowski@tritech.com> Training Details
DOWNLOAD INFORMATION <http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/Invite_Agenda_March13-14_3013.pdf>
Dates: March 13-14, 2013
Location: CCRI Knight Campus - 400 East Ave., Room 4080 Warwick, RI 02886-1807 Click here for map <https://maps.google.com/maps?ie=UTF-8&q=CCRI+Knight+Campus+-+400+East+Ave.+Room+4080,+Warwick,+RI+02886-1807&fb=1&gl=us&hq=CCRI+Knight+Campus+-&hnear=0x89e44b8ba41f92dd:0xe0c5e0b9d784eb9e,400+East+Ave+%234080,+Warwick,+RI+02886&cid=0,0,1616561205729161238&ei=jDsIUcGdFoma9QSQ1oGoDw&ved=0CI8BEPwSMAE>
